as_at_date.title: As at Date
as_at_date.description: The date in which the figure was generated at.

year.title: Year
year.description: The year in which the measure was taken or budgeted at.

actual_budget_plan.title: Actual/Budget/Plan
actual_budget_plan.description: Indication if the value was actual, budget (allocated), or plan (an estimate at the start of the financial year).

category.title: Category
category.description: One of Capital, Disposal of assets, Expenditure, or Revenue.

sub_category.title: Sub Category
sub_category.description: A sub category for indicating additional breakdown of category. Ie. Grants and Revenues may be a sub category of Revenue.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the financial measure.

value_000.title: Value ($,000)
value_000.description: The dollar value (AUD) in thousands of the financial indicator.
